job.title: Remote Recruiting Project Manager
job.description: pstrongRemote Recruiting Engagement  Project ManagerstrongppnbspppbrppJoin a company that truly understands their customers business needs and delivers unparalleled resultsppstrongnbspstrongppstrongWho We ArestrongppWe are an experienced team of professionals ready to seamlessly assist with our clients recruiting projects Our results driven recruitment model offers tremendous flexibility over costly traditional recruitment methods We invest in our clients so they can be successful We spend the time and make the effort to know their business and understand their hiring needs in detail so we can quickly identify and screen toptier talent for them to make the best hire We offer a remote workforce and partner with clients nationwide both at headquarter locations and satellite  plant locationsnbspnbspppnbspppstrongWho You ArestrongppAs our Engagement Manager you will function as the voice of your customernbspYou will be responsible for strengthening relationships with clients while managing internal resources to meet delivery needsppYou will indirectly lead the service team to ensure successful project completion while providing a seamless extension to the clients internal Human Resources  Talent Acquisition teamppnbspppAs an Engagement Manager you will oversee several projects simultaneously provide daily project updates evaluate delivery goals and customer requirements as well as analyze industry trends and conduct competitive assessments Engagement Managers are passionate about meeting customer needs and are exceptional communicators who conduct business with uncompromising professionalism and integritynbspppnbspppstronguMajor Duties and ResponsibilitiesustrongppnbspppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspManage each project effectively to meet or exceed client expectationsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspServe as the voice of the customer when communicating with candidates about the clients corporate culture and position requirementsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspServe as the team leadpoint of contact for intake meetings and status calls with clientsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspParticipate as a true extension of the clients hiring team by listening to their needs gaining a true understanding of their corporate culture and successfully presenting those needs to Mj3 Partners internal teams in order to ensure accurate project executionppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspParticipate in and coordinate sourcing and recruiting efforts for the most effective candidate outreach using our proven systems and processesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspEngage qualify and submit candidates for assigned positionsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAnticipate the needs and concerns of the client and address them proactivelyppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspSeek frequent client feedback regarding submitted candidates and the level of satisfaction with our servicenbspUpdate them on the progress and goal statusppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspMaintain open lines of communication with clients and address trends issues  concerns or changing requirements directly Update the internal team accordinglyppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspCreate update and distribute project plansppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspGenerate and review clientfacing reports and deliver in a timely manner as agreed upon with the clientsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspUpsell and expand existing business by generating additional positions andor cross selling different services when appropriate to meet client needs resources and budgetsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspParticipate in client meetings as necessarynbspppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWork closely with upper management to ensure the scope and direction of each project is on schedule and address any obstacles as neededppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspMay perform other duties as assignedppnbspppstronguRequired Skills and ExperienceustrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBachelors degree or equivalent work experienceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp2 years of fullcycle recruiting expppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp2 years of experience sourcing qualified candidates based on a job requisition using LinkedIn RecruiterppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspProficient in creating Boolean Search Strings from scratch to source qualified candidatesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp2 years of external client project management experienceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspOpen to potential contract workppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspProven ability to recognize ways to grow the business improve services and minimize client cost per hireppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to indirectly manage supervise and lead others to achieve common goalsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPrior experience using an Applicant Tracking System ppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspIntermediate experience with Microsoft Office suite applicationsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStrong multitasking competency and the ability to work well under pressureppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExcellent verbal and written communication skillsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExceptional organizational skillsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspCritical thinking  problem solving skillsppnbspppstronguPreferred Skills and Experienceustrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp5 years of overall professional experience in a similar industrynbspHuman Resources or recruiting strongly preferredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPrior agency experience preferredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPrior WebEx experience MSTeams Zoom GotomeetingppbrppstrongWhat its Like to Work HerestrongppWe are a team driven by Customer Service and we pride ourselves on delivering outstanding services to our clientsnbspWe measure ourselves by successful project engagements and repeat businessnbspWe understand the potential impact an unfilled position can have on our clients and we strive to introduce fullyqualified and interview ready candidates into the process swiftlynbspJust as no two candidates are the same no two days at Mj3 Partners is the samenbspYou will be challenged to meet the goal of your client in a fastpaced but fun and flexible environmentnbspWe are committed to finding the right fit for our clients and candidates and the right worklife balance for our employeesppnbspppstrongWhat We OfferstrongppIn addition to training and career advancement opportunities we offer competitive salaries flexibility in work schedules remote work and a generous paid time off packagenbspWe offer a retirement plan with a company match STLT Disability and Life InsurancenbspWe also continually examine our employee benefit offering and look for new benefits and programs to add which are in high demand by our employeesnbspMj3 is the ideal environment for professionals that are selfmotivated and looking for the optimal worklife balanceppnbspppstrongThink Youve Got What it TakesstrongppIf youre ready to have some fun focus on results work with a dynamic professional team and drive for the pursuit of quality and excellence in everything you do we want you to join usppemnbspemppemMj3 Partners provides equal employment opportunities EEO to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin age disability or geneticsemppnbspppp
